VisitorExclusion.PluginDescription: Block visits at the tracker level using configurable field-based rules.
VisitorExclusion.PageDescription: Define rules to silently exclude specific visitors from being tracked. Visits matching a rule are dropped at tracking time â€” the visitor receives a normal 200 response but no data is recorded.
VisitorExclusion.Warning: Warning: exclusion rules are applied at tracker time. Dropped visits are permanently lost and cannot be recovered.
VisitorExclusion.NoRules: No exclusion rules defined yet. Use the form below to add your first rule.
VisitorExclusion.ErrorNoConditions: At least one condition is required.
VisitorExclusion.ErrorInvalidIpRange: Invalid IP address or CIDR range: %s
VisitorExclusion.OpNotInIpRange: is not in IP / CIDR range
VisitorExclusion.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this exclusion rule? This action cannot be undone.
VisitorExclusion.HintIp: Single IP or CIDR range. Comma-separate multiple entries.
VisitorExclusion.HintUserAgent: The browser/bot string sent by the visitor. Use 'contains' or 'matches regex' for partial matches.
VisitorExclusion.HintPageUrl: Full URL or partial path of the tracked page.
VisitorExclusion.HintReferrerUrl: Full URL or domain of the referring page.
VisitorExclusion.HintDeviceType: Value detected by DeviceDetector from the User Agent.
VisitorExclusion.HintBrowserName: Browser name as detected by DeviceDetector.
VisitorExclusion.HintOperatingSystem: OS name as detected by DeviceDetector.
VisitorExclusion.HintBrowserLanguage: Two-letter ISO 639-1 code sent by the browser in Accept-Language.
VisitorExclusion.HintScreenResolution: Width x Height as reported by the browser (e.g. 1920x1080). Empty if the visitor blocked it.
VisitorExclusion.HintCustomDimension: The value passed in the tracking request for this custom dimension.
VisitorExclusion.HintRegexNote: No delimiters. Use | for alternatives. Case-insensitive by default.
